welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Tomisato, Japan! Get ready to immerse yourself in the charming atmosphere of our city known for its traditional temples, delicious cuisine, and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and experience all that Tomisato has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main international terminal at Narita International Airport, serving most major airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A secondary international terminal at Narita International Airport, mainly used by low-cost carriers.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A domestic terminal at Narita International Airport, serving domestic flights within Japan.

wifi.note: Limited to 30 minutes per session, with unlimited number of sessions.
